sentences.en: A lion's mane jellyfish nestled in a kelp frond.
sentences.cn: 一只狮鬃水母呆在一片海藻叶子中.

sentences.en: Are jellyfish and prawn mixed what is raising a technology?
sentences.cn: 海蜇与对虾混养技术是 什么 ?

sentences.en: But many marine experts have been saying for several years that we need to start loving jellyfish – because in the not too distant future, they may be the most plentiful marine species around.
sentences.cn: 但是，多年来，许多海洋专家一直在说，我们需要开始热爱水母——因为在不远的将来，它们也许是我们周围最丰富的海洋物种。

sentences.en: How many jellyfish can you see? One, two, three!
sentences.cn: 你可以看见多少水母? 一 、 二 、 三只!

sentences.en: It is this form that grows into the adult medusa jellyfish.
sentences.cn: 正是碟状幼体产生了成年的水母体海蜇.

sentences.en: Jellyfish are one of the most well - known colonial organisms.
sentences.cn: 水母是最有名的群体生物之一.

sentences.en: Jellyfish come in a variety of shapes, sizes and colors.
sentences.cn: 海蜇有各种形状 、 大小和颜色.

sentences.en: Jellyfish drift in the frigid waters of Alaska's Inside Passage.
sentences.cn: 水母漂移,在寒冷水域,阿拉斯加的里面通过.

sentences.en: Mr. Loughlin and others at the beach said it took a while for everyone to realize what was happening, because jellyfish stings are so rare at the beach.
sentences.cn: 洛夫林先生和其他在海滩上的人说，过了好一会儿，大家才意识到发生了什么，因为水母蜇人在这片海滩上实属罕见。

sentences.en: One capsized after the jellyfish became entangled in its nets.
sentences.cn: 有一艘渔船被这种水母缠住渔网之后,倾翻了.

sentences.en: So how long will it be before we can become jellyfish - like immortals?
sentences.cn: 我们还要过多久才能像水母那样长生不老?

sentences.en: The jellyfish sting actually comes from tiny nematocysts on the jellyfish body.
sentences.cn: 海蜇的蛰刺实际上来自海蜇体上微小的刺丝囊刺细胞.

sentences.en: The sting of a jellyfish is very painful.
The unfortunate prey is then drawn into the jellyfish's mouth.
sentences.cn: 接着这不幸的猎物就被吸入水母的嘴里.

sentences.en: There are well - known Ruiyun Temple, jellyfish Temple, Yong - owned kiosks, as Ha Temple.
sentences.cn: 知名 的有瑞云禅寺 、 水母庙 、 咏归亭 、 碧霞祠等.

sentences.en: This has allowed jellyfish become the lower reaches of the chain.
sentences.cn: 这使得水母在食物链中处于更低端的位置.

sentences.en: You can get a nasty sting from a jellyfish.
sentences.cn: 你可能会被水母狠狠地蜇一下.

words.tran_cn: 水母；[无脊椎]海蜇；软弱无能的人

trans.tran_cn: 水母，海蜇，软弱无用的人，意志薄弱的人
trans.tran_en: a sea animal that has a round transparent body and can sting you
